item.title: Rethink how you test your API
item.description: In the current digital world, with the increased demand for having everything on a click or at oneâ€™s fingertips, has forced companies to change the way they interact with or give an experience to users. The user expects real-time data at any given point of time and anywhere! APIs bridge the gap between app/product and the backend legacy systems (including Mainframe) that most of the time maintain all the data.
